title: Creatine supplementation and cognitive performance under sleep restriction

sections.abstract: This study investigated whether creatine supplementation can attenuate cognitive performance decrements during short-term sleep restriction in healthy adults...
sections.introduction: Creatine plays a role in brain energy metabolism, suggesting it may support cognitive function when energetic demands are high or sleep is reduced...
sections.results: Participants receiving creatine showed smaller declines in reaction time and working memory accuracy after two nights of restricted sleep compared to placebo...
sections.conclusion: Creatine may offer modest protective effects on cognition during brief periods of sleep restriction, though effects were task-specific...
